verbs.description: pittsburgh [V: has] unexpectedly become a climate battleground after trump ditched the paris agreement with one sentence president donald trump laid the foundation for pittsburgh to be at the center of a post - paris climate battle donald trump paris trump pittsburgh bill peduto paris illinois
